src:
Tak Bisa Merapat, Satgas Bencana Lantamal V Bagikan Air dengan Jerigen
06 Nov 2019, 18:41 by Anik Hasanah


Tak Bisa Merapat, Satgas Bencana Lantamal V Bagikan Air dengan Jerigen

KBRN, Surabaya : TD Bromo dan TD Tambora yang membawa tongkang air tawar untuk didistribusikan ke warga masyarakat tidak bisa merapat di pelabuhan rakyat Pulau Gili Raja karena dangkal, akhirnya memutuskan lego jangkar dan membagikan air tawar dengan menggunakan jerigen. Hal tersebut diungkapkan Ketua Tim Operasi Bakti Sosial Penanggulangan Bencana Kekeringan Pangkalan Utama TNI AL V (Lantamal  V) Kapten Laut (P) Muhammad Syaiful Ali, (Pabandya Renlat Sops Lantamal V ) saat tiba di Pelabuhan Cangcang, Dusun Cangcang, Desa Lombang, Kec Giligenting, Pulau Gili Raja, Sumenep, Rabu (6/11/2019).Sehari sebelumnya, Tim Satgas Bencana Lantamal V sudah mendistribusikan air tawar kepada masyarakat terdampak kekeringan di Pulau Sapudi yang dalam pelaksanaannya ditinjau langsung Gubernur Jatim Khofifah Indar Parawanda,  Pangkoarmada ll Laksda TNI Heru Kusmanto dan Komandan Lantamal V Laksma TNI Tedjo Sukmono, S.E.,CHRMP 5 November kemarin. "Kendala dangkalnya perairan di sekitar Pulau Giliraja menyebabkan kita tidak bisa merapatkan tongkang air, namun dengan kerjasama yang baik dengan warga,  air diisikan jerigen jerigen dan diangkut dengan perahu perahu milik rakyat untuk dibagikan kepada masyarakat di Pulau Giliraja," tetang Ali, dalam siaran pers kepada RRI. Pendistribusian air tawar di Pulau Gili Raja ini lanjut Ali, mendapat sambutan yang begitu hangat dari masyrakat setempat,  hal tersebut dapat dilihat dari banyaknya masyarakat yang rela  hadir dan membawa jerigen yang anteri untuk mendapatkan air yang bisa dikatakan langka di pulau ini. Sebelum pendistribusian, bantuan 200 ton air bersih ini diserahkan secara sombolik di Deck Tongkang TK T.400 milik Lantamal V oleh Kapten Laut (P) Muhammad Syaiful Ali kepada Juherman Kades  Lombang Gili Raja, Kades Banbaru Gili Raja dan Kades Banmaleng Ali Bangsul serta perwakilan dari Relawan Air Bersih Sumenep, Syaiful Anam.Hadir dalam kegiatan tersebut  Kapolsek Gili Genting Iptu Agus Karyadi, Abdul Hasan Camat Gili Genting, Kades Lombeng, Tomas Desa Lombeng dan Desa Banbaru dan  Aiptu Rahmad Wahyudi Kanit Sabhara Polsek Gili Genting/Babinkamtibmas.
text:
Cannot Be docked, Lantamal V Disaster Task Force Distributes Water with Jerry cans
Nov 6, 2019, 18:41 by Anik Hasanah


Cannot Be docked, Lantamal V Disaster Task Force Distributes Water with Jerry cans

KBRN, Surabaya: TD Bromo and TD Tambora which carry freshwater barges for distribution to community members cannot dock at the people's harbor of Gili Raja Island because it is shallow, finally breaking the anchor lego and distributing fresh water using jerry cans. This was revealed by the Chairman of the Operations Team for the Social Service for Disaster Mitigation of the Indonesian Navy Base V (Lantamal V) Sea Captain (P) Muhammad Syaiful Ali, (Pabandya Renlat Sops Lantamal V) when he arrived at Cangcang Port, Cangcang Hamlet, Lombang Village, Giligenting District , Gili Raja Island, Sumenep, Wednesday (11/6/2019). The previous day, the Lantamal V Disaster Task Force Team had distributed fresh water to the drought affected communities on Sapudi Island which in its implementation was reviewed directly by East Java Governor Khofifah Indar Parawanda, Pangkoarmada ll Laksda TNI TNI Heru Kusmanto and Lantamal V Commander Admiral TNI Tedjo Sukmono, SE, CHRMP 5 November yesterday. "The shallow obstacles in the waters around Giliraja Island make it impossible for us to close the water barge, but with good cooperation with the residents, the water is filled with jerry cans and transported by people's boats to be distributed to the people on Giliraja Island," Ali said, in a press release to RRI. The distribution of fresh water on the island of Gili Raja continued Ali, received a very warm welcome from the local community, it can be seen from the many people who were willing to attend and bring jerry cans that were queued to get water that could be said to be scarce on this island. Before the distribution, the 200 ton aid of clean water was handed over to the TAMMAR T.400 Kindergarten Deck Deck by the Sea Captain (P) Muhammad Syaiful Ali to Juherman Kades Lombang Gili Raja, Banbaru Gili Raja Village Head and Banmaleng Village Ali Bangsul and representatives from Sumenep Clean Water Volunteers, Syaiful Anam. Attending the activity were the Gili Genting Police Chief, Iptu Agus Karyadi, Abdul Hasan, the Gili Genting Sub-District Head, Lombades Village Chief, Tomas Lombeng Village and Banbaru Village and Aiptu Rahmad Wahyudi Kanit Sabhara, Gili Genting / Babinkamtibmas Sub-District Police Chief.
